message: Hi Bob, I'm selling a product that I think you'll find very valuable. I'm offering it to you for $110.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90.
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  I'm willing to come down a bit to $100. I believe this product will bring you a lot of value.
I'm still interested in the product, but I think $85 is a more reasonable price.
Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  How about we split the difference and settle at $92.50? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still thinking $87.50 is a more reasonable price.
